scripts.bucket: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket get-name-stack-deployment-bucket --region eu-west-1 --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=eu-west-1
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file build/output.yaml --s3-bucket get-name-stack-deployment-bucket
scripts.deploy:pre-push: npm run folder && npm run package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/output.yaml --stack-name get-name-stack-pre-push --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides StackName=get-name StageName=pre-push
scripts.deploy:master: npm run folder && npm run package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/output.yaml --stack-name get-name-stack-master --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides StackName=get-name StageName=master
scripts.deploy:release: npm run folder && npm run package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/output.yaml --stack-name get-name-stack-release --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides StackName=get-name StageName=release
